project.name: C-C127A-SUBV-02-ST03-DT07-DF14-CF23-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C127A-SUBV-02-ST03-DT07-DF14-CF23-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository Has a stack buffer of size 128. reads in an ascii string from an environmentvariable and increments the corresponding values in the stack buffer. Then reads in an input and prints out the count of the characters from the stack buff of those in the input. If input contains extended ascii characters, they will be wrapped around to negative values and the buffer will be under read

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C127A-SUBV-02-ST03-DT07-DF14-CF23-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file Has a stack buffer of size 128. reads in an ascii string from an environmentvariable and increments the corresponding values in the stack buffer. Then reads in an input and prints out the count of the characters from the stack buff of those in the input. If input contains extended ascii characters, they will be wrapped around to negative values and the buffer will be under read

process.script: cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="This is probably not going to overflow a buffer of some sort. Let's run it anyway and see what happens." --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C127A-SUBV-02-ST03-DT07-DF14-CF23-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Has a stack buffer of size 128. reads in an ascii string from an environmentvariable and increments the corresponding values in the stack buffer. Then reads in an input and prints out the count of the characters from the stack buff of those in the input. If input contains extended ascii characters, they will be wrapped around to negative values and the buffer will be under read

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="$(echo QUFBQUFBQUFBQUFBQUFBQUFBQUFBQUFBQUGugIE= | base64 --decode)" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_wCyUVyp03auz9v47EbPq AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (output_excess_non_null_D7Wh7rtZCB) AND NOT timeout_57LP3pkekZ) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((output_excess_non_null_D7Wh7rtZCB) OR timeout_57LP3pkekZ OR controlled_exit_2CCoyDm3gb)))
(NOT PERFORMER AND (output_excess_non_null_D7Wh7rtZCB) AND NOT timeout_57LP3pkekZ) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((output_excess_non_null_D7Wh7rtZCB) OR timeout_57LP3pkekZ OR controlled_exit_2CCoyDm3gb))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep -P "value [\x80-\xFF] appears: 5555 times" "../logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0)); then true; else false; fi;
